definition: an assemblage of parts that is regarded as a single entity
details:
noun
- an assemblage of parts that is regarded as a single entity
= synonyms: whole
- a single undivided whole
= example: a single undivided whole
- an organization regarded as part of a larger social group
= example: an organization regarded as part of a larger social group
= synonyms: social unit
- a single undivided natural thing occurring in the composition of something else
= example: a single undivided natural thing occurring in the composition of something else
= synonyms: building block
- any division of quantity accepted as a standard of measurement or exchange
= example: any division of quantity accepted as a standard of measurement or exchange
= synonyms: unit of measurement
- an individual or group or structure or other entity regarded as a structural or functional constituent of a whole
= example: an individual or group or structure or other entity regarded as a structural or functional constituent of a whole
